description: three prints, taped together horizontally at back; top print: open book with text and scribbles; collaged photographs, newspaper clippings and film on top of image; center print: open book in yellows and reds with newspaper clippings on pages; two blister packed pills attached to surface; bottom print: open book with female figure on each page; toy alligator attached to bottom edge, eye-shadow brush attached to lower R edge; photos and film collaged onto image; red and white pigment smears overall
marks:
Signature, inscription and mark
Bottom center, in signature embedded into inscriptions
title: Untitled Diary Collage
